Player History
Drafted in 31st round, 490th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2016...
Released by Brooklyn on 6/30/2016...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Traded from New York to Chicago on 2/15/2018 (Going to NY: 2B Grant Dear. Going to CHI: P Andrew Battle, C Gregory Menges, P Mario Thibodeau)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/24/2018, off Earnest Spillman (BRO)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/17/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Cincinnati on 3/2/2019.
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
